about_the_game:
Year 3 Pass!

This pass unlocks all the DLC that we will release during hexceed's third year! We will be releasing a new DLC every 2 months, each containing a new world to complete. 6 new worlds to explore! Over 700 levels to complete!

Contents

Although each DLC will be available for purchase individually, this year 3 pass will shave 16% off the total price.
Here is a breakdown of the DLCs included, as well as when we intend to introduce some new mechanics to the game:
  • 1 - Aqua (Feb 2023)
  • 2 - Ignis (Apr 2023) + new mechanic
  • 3 - Terra (Jun 2023)
  • 4 - Ventus (Aug 2023) + new mechanic
  • 5 - Metallicum (Oct 2023)
  • 6 - Glacialis (Dec 2023)
